# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/sinon`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Sinon (http://sinonjs.org/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/sinon
